Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.primitive

Class Doubles

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.language.primitive.Doubles
public class Doubles extends Object
Utility methods for working with double values
  • parseFastDouble(String, double) - Fast parsing given a fixed number of decimal places
  • formatDouble(double) - The value formatted with only one decimal place
  • formatDouble(double, int) - The value formatted with the given number of decimal places
  • doubleInRange(double, double, double) - Returns the given value constrained to the given range
  • doubleIsBetweenInclusive(double, double, double) - True if the value is in the given range
  • doubleRounded(double) - Returns the given value rounded to the nearest int
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

      Parameters:

      minimum - The minimum value (inclusive)
      maximum - The maximum value (exclusive)

    • parseFastDouble

      public static double parseFastDouble(String value, double denominator)
      A fast way to parse a simple double of the format xxx.yyyy where the number of digits in y is fixed. For example: 
       var result = fastParse("3.1415", 1_0000);
 assert result == 3.1415;
      Parameters:
      value - The value to parse
      denominator - The value to divide y by to get the digits to the right of the decimal place
      Returns:
      The double value
